```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(tsibble)
library(fabletools)
library(readxl)
library(openxlsx)
```

```{r}
amzn_csv <- read.csv("AMZN.csv")
amzn_csv
```

```{r}
amzn_csv$Date = ymd(amzn_csv$Date)
```

```{r}
amzn <- amzn_csv %>% 
  as_tsibble(index = Date)
amzn
```

```{r}
class(amzn)
```

```{r}
amzn |>
  autoplot(Close) + 
  labs(y = "Prices", title = "Historic Prices AMZN")


```
